service.name: Appalachian Mountains
service.description: Join us for a climb up the Appalachian Mountains located in central Pennsylvania.

service.name: Yosemite
service.description: Experience the beauty of Yosemite! Grab a coffee and climb!

service.name: Blue Mountain
service.description: Experience the views of Blue Mountain! Enjoy Christmas with family on the peak of Blue Mountain.

service.name: Bauer Rock (South Mountain)
service.description: Take a trip down to Bauer Rock in the South Mountains. Experience this hard leveled course with all of your friends!
